Literature.Title: De novo design and synthesis of ultra-short peptidomimetic antibiotics having dual antimicrobial and anti-inflammatory activities.
Literature.Author: Murugan RN, Jacob B, Ahn M, Hwang E, Sohn H, Park HN, Lee E, Seo JH, Cheong C, Nam KY, Hyun JK, Jeong KW, Kim Y, Shin SY, Bang JK

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli KCTC 1682(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa KCTC 1637(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis KCTC 1917(MIC=2µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus KCTC 1621(MIC=2µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus CCARM 3089(MIC=2µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus CCARM 3090(MIC=2µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus CCARM 3095(MIC=2µg/ml)
